Posts.Content: Just got a call back today. I am 51 and have had clean mammograms for 14years. I am in perimenopause and this year has been up and down with my cycles. Could this play into things on the mammogram? They were vague saying they wanted another look on the left side with a possible ultrasound. Of course I am a wreck!!
Posts.Title: Second Call back On Mammogram and scared
